price: (Zakariya) aravuga ati “Nyagasani wanjye! Mpa ikimenyetso.” (Allah) aravuga ati “Ikimenyetso cyawe ni uko utazabasha kuvugisha abantu amajoro atatu kandi umeze neza nta cyo ubaye.”
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱجۡعَل لِّيٓ ءَايَةٗۖ قَالَ ءَايَتُكَ أَلَّا تُكَلِّمَ ٱلنَّاسَ ثَلَٰثَ لَيَالٖ سَوِيّٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi ij'ʿal lī āyatan qāla āyatuka allā tukallima al-nāsa thalātha layālin sawiyyan
